item.title: IDAPython Reference Counter
item.description: I created a small IDAPython plugin which enumerates all of the the x-references in a specific segment and counts the frequency of usage. The plugin displays the data in QtTableWidget and lets the user filter and sort the references. You can also export the data to a CSV file. You can find the code at my github repository. This plugin is particularly useful when reverse engineering large executables (games). In the video below, I demonstrate the plugin on an IDA database of Diablo 3 (patch 2.3).
